title: Sue Cat
synopsis: After an accident, the amnesiac Sue was taken in to live with Torao's family. She always had the urge to become a singer, but didn't know why. As it turns out, Sue is actually part of a band formed with her two twin sisters. But Sue's climb to the top of the charts is a long and hard way.
voices: ['Tsuruoka, Yayoi', 'Hashimoto, Kouichi', 'Masuoka, Hiroshi', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Aomori, Shin', 'Onoda, Eiichi', 'Yokozawa, Keiko']
staff: [['Terada, Kenji', ['Episode Director']], ['Yotsuji, Takao', ['Episode Director', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Yoshida, Hiroshi', ['Episode Director']], ['Pierpont, James Lord', ['Theme Song Composition']]]
